name: Gobuddy – The smart delivery solution
author: Gobuddy Network

sections.description:
Gobuddy is the most innovative and sustainable delivery solution for WooCommerce eCommerce retailers.

Gobuddy’s intelligent software and delivery platform is designed to reduce the carbon emissions of deliveries, reduce the cost of transporting goods, empower people and provide your business with a powerful system that creates efficiencies, saving you time.

We match the travel routes of ordinary people with goods moving in the same direction.

Our solution:
– Reduces transport costs by up to 50% compared to other couriers
– Unlocks access to untapped, underserved markets
– Provides scalable opportunities for businesses
– Drastically reduces travel emissions
– Integrates your WooCommerce orders and delivery information from your existing couriers into a single dashboard
– Provides details of your priority, in progress and completed deliveries

How it Works

  • We understand the potential reputational risk of replacing what already works. That’s why we’ve built a complementary delivery option that runs alongside a retailer’s existing delivery service.

  • Our Gobuddy plugin will first check for a Gobuddy Transporter, if none is found for the specific delivery then the delivery will automatically be redirected to the retailers’ usual WooCommerce integrated delivery option.

  • We utilise the tracking and shipment data of the complementary delivery options to give retailers a full picture of all of their delivery data for their company, regardless of who the delivery partner was.

  • The current complementary delivery options/3rd party as a service options that we use are:

    1. Bobgo:
      Service: https://www.bobgo.co.za/
      Terms of use: https://www.bobgo.co.za/terms
      Privacy policy: https://www.bob.co.za/privacy-policy/

    2. Pargo:
      Service: https://pargo.co.za/
      Terms of use: https://pargo.co.za/terms-and-conditions/
      Privacy policy: https://pargo.co.za/privacy-policy/

    3. The Courier Guy:
      Service: https://www.thecourierguy.co.za/
      Terms of use: https://www.thecourierguy.co.za/terms-conditions/
      Privacy policy: https://www.thecourierguy.co.za/privacy-policy/
sections.installation: See the installation and setup guide on – https://gobuddy.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/Getting-set-up-guide-2.pdf
sections.faq:
What are your delivery fees?

  • See our pricing guide here: https://gobuddy.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/Gobuddy-Pricing-guide-2023.pdf

Are your deliveries insured?

  • Yes, by King Price.
sections.changelog:
2.3.0

  • Change cron time to twice a daily.
  • Order status will only checked on order page.

2.2.0

  • Make plugin WordPress 6.5 & WooCommerce 8.7 compatible.
  • Updated order modified datetime after adding note related to GoBuddy transporter found final status.
  • Added order object for TCG send order.

2.1.1.1

  • Fixed Bobgo get delivery cost issue.

2.1.1

  • Added exception for Pickup Store.

2.1.0

  • Implemented TradeSafe wallet feature for shop owners.

2.0.9

  • Updated Gobuddy order shipping title.

2.0.8

  • Updated tradesafe graphql endpoint.

2.0.7

  • Fixed tradesafe parties fees allocation.
  • Fixed Gobuddy transporter search expiry save issue.

2.0.6

  • Added remove feature to onetime orders.

2.0.5

  • Updated send order update flow.

2.0.4

  • Added activation / deactivation log.
  • Added api test.

2.0.3

  • Added extra validation to add tradesafe split payment.
  • Update order status to completed when order is delivered.

2.0.2

  • Added validation to check GB keys before sending an order.

2.0.1

  • Fixed double note add for no transporter found.

2.0.0

  • Added GoBuddy Transporter Search feature.

1.2.12

  • Fixed get order from date when plugin is activated.

1.2.11

  • Removed order shipping method check.

1.2.10

  • Updated GB config storage.

1.2.9

  • Added TCG API v2 support.

1.2.8

  • Added plugin activation, deactivation & uninstall hook.

1.2.7

  • Fetching waypoints on every update & get all types of orders.

1.2.6

  • Added date to get order for tracking.

1.2.5

  • Fetch fixed_rate order update.

1.2.4

  • Fixed order tracking data.

1.2.3

  • Added log feature.

1.2.2

  • Updated uAfrica order tracking.

1.2.1

  • Updated gobuddy order value in send order.

1.2.0

  • Updated The Courier Guy and Pargo order tracking.
  • Updated order total weight for old orders.

1.1.2

  • Added Gobuddy store keys and Shipping name.

1.1.1

  • Fixed Database option keys.

1.1.0

  • Replace woocommerce_new_order hook with woocommerce_checkout_order_created hook.
  • Added start point & end point when send order to Gobuddy.

1.0.1

  • Update staging environment to live environment.

1.0.0

  • Initial Release.

short_description: The official Gobuddy plugin for WooCommerce
